channel.title: Making a client with D cape + claws etc
channel.description:
I want to make a 317 pvp client (like massacred world, bringing back memories, unfortunately got legal issues with no-ip). So it works fine in silabclient but when i get d claws it comes up with "other" items. Well, i know about that, so how would i make my own client with customs? Like, changing the IP of the client so when logging on it goes to my server.
Will be great and Rep! Lots of detail please im a noobie!

item.title: Making a client with D cape + claws etc
item.dc:creator: @puffypain puffypain
item.description:
@puffypain wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:2, topic:337435”]Download a simple delta client, look in the downloads section.

To change your ip so that everyone can connect, most clients have a Gui.java. Search for:

Serverip =

Change whatever that is to your IP.[/quote]

Thanks a bunch, will it come with D claws and Death Cape? or will i have to download codes separately

Read full topic
item.source: Making a client with D cape + claws etc

item.title: Making a client with D cape + claws etc
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Download a simple delta client, look in the downloads section.

To change your ip so that everyone can connect, most clients have a Gui.java. Search for:

Serverip =

Change whatever that is to your IP.
